summary: Raj is a heartbreaker. His love stories with Mahi, Radhika and Gayatri finally teach him about love and life in their own sweet, sexy and sassy way.
cast: Ranbir Kapoor|Deepika Padukone|Bipasha Basu|Minissha Lamba|Kunal Kapoor|Hiten Paintal|Puneet Issar|Menekka Arora|Sumit Arora|Ntasha Bhardwaj|Pratik Dixit|Bidyut Dumra|Karan Gill|Avantika Hundal|Willi Jezler|Brad Kennerley|Rashmi Kulkarni|Andy Kumar|Roy Lange|Bhanu Mehra|Aishveryaa Nidhi|Hannah-Lee Osborn|Cameron Pearson|Florian Philip|Ramandeep|Gurbhej Randhawa|Jay Ruparelia|Gurpreet Sandhu|Andrea Santarelli|Shyam Mashalkar|Ravprit Singh|Sukhmeet Singh|Meena Sukhani|Madhurima Tuli|Parvati Vaze|Stefanie Wirz|Val Athanassiou
title: Bachna Ae Haseeno
